alert.note: Alert for Cocke; Greene; Hamblen (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 07 at 2:47PM CDT until August 07 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of east Tennessee, including the following counties, Carter, Cocke, Greene, Hamblen, Hawkins, Unicoi and Washington. * WHEN...Until 545 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 346 PM EDT, Heavy rain has ended but scattered showers continue. Minor flooding remains a threat in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Johnson City, Morristown, Greeneville, Elizabethton, Newport, Erwin, Jonesborough, Tusculum, Parrottsville, Midway, Russellville, Banner Hill, Pine Crest, Central, Unicoi, Mosheim, Bulls Gap, Baileyton, Camp Creek and Chucky. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
